export var questionObj = {
  "Qtext": "
In the adjoining figure, it is given that triangle UVW and triangle XYZ are similar triangles. Their side lengths are given as 
\[
	UV = 2 x - 1 cm
\]
\[
	VW = 2x + 2 cm
\]
\[
	UW = 3 x cm
\]
\[
	XZ = 6x cm
\]
\[
	ZY = 3x + 9 cm
\]
\[
	XY = 18 cm
\]
\newline
tikzpicture{}
\newline 
\newline

Find \(x\) and calculate the length of all the sides of 2 triangles. \newline

",
  "Steps": [{
    "id": "s1",
    "n_params": 0,
    "step_txt": "$$\text{It is given that $\Delta UVW \sim \Delta XYZ $. so, we can write 
\[
	\frac{UV }{XY } = \frac{VW }{YZ } = \frac{WU }{ZX }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{2 x - 1 }{18 } = \frac{2x + 2}{3x + 9} = \frac{3 x }{6x}
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{2 x - 1 }{18 } = \frac{3 x }{6x}
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow 2 x - 1 = 9.0 
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow 2 x = 10.0 
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow x = 5.0 
\]
So, now we can find the sides as
\[
	UV = 2 \times 5 + 1 = 11 cm
\]
\[
	VW = 2x + 2 = 12 cm
\]
\[
	UW = 3 x = 15 cm
\]
\[
	XZ = 6x = 30 cm
\]
\[
	ZY = 3x + 9 = 24 cm
\]
\[
	XY = 18 cm
\]
\newline

"
  }]
};
export var resp = [{
  "data": [],
  "text": " "
}];

sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
In the adjoining figure, it is given that triangle UVW and triangle XYZ are similar triangles. Their side lengths are given as 
\[
	UV = 2 x - 1 cm
\]
\[
	VW = 2x + 2 cm
\]
\[
	UW = 3 x cm
\]
\[
	XZ = 6x cm
\]
\[
	ZY = 3x + 9 cm
\]
\[
	XY = 18 cm
\]
\newline
tikzpicture{}
\newline 
\newline

Find \(x\) and calculate the length of all the sides of 2 triangles. \newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "$$\text{It is given that $\Delta UVW \sim \Delta XYZ $. so, we can write 
\[
	\frac{UV }{XY } = \frac{VW }{YZ } = \frac{WU }{ZX }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{2 x - 1 }{18 } = \frac{2x + 2}{3x + 9} = \frac{3 x }{6x}
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{2 x - 1 }{18 } = \frac{3 x }{6x}
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow 2 x - 1 = 9.0 
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow 2 x = 10.0 
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow x = 5.0 
\]
So, now we can find the sides as
\[
	UV = 2 \times 5 + 1 = 11 cm
\]
\[
	VW = 2x + 2 = 12 cm
\]
\[
	UW = 3 x = 15 cm
\]
\[
	XZ = 6x = 30 cm
\]
\[
	ZY = 3x + 9 = 24 cm
\]
\[
	XY = 18 cm
\]
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": " "}]
